name: Run or Gun (egon42)
description:
In this 2v2 deathmatch, each team has 1 Runner and 1 Gunner. The Gunner is invincible so the only way to score is to kill their Runner. However, the Runner needs to collect ammo and deliver it to the Gunner in order to do that. Both players will need to take care of each other's needs in order to succeed.

 

Runners

  • Has a hover board and a double jump
  • Collect ammo for your Gunner
  • Don't get shot!

Gunners

  • Slower and unable to jump
  • Kill the enemy Runner to score
  • Invincible!
